ModMetaData.name: Natural Surgery (More)
ModMetaData.author: Jem
ModMetaData.description:
Added Brain, ear & nose surgeries for Human. Buy the natural body parts from traders, or harvest from prisoners. Remove these items on map before Disable mod.
Added Rejuvenating entire body for All living creatures. All unnatural additions & defects will be removed.
Credit to Arrean for adding Ear.
